name: Introduction to Computer Science
overview: This unit provides an introduction to the fundamental concepts of computer science.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
overview: This unit covers the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Database Management Systems
overview: This unit explores the concepts and principles of database management systems.

name: Software Engineering Principles
overview: This unit covers software engineering methodologies and best practices.

name: Advanced Algorithms
overview: This unit covers advanced algorithms and data structures.

name: Cloud Computing Technologies
overview: This unit explores cloud computing technologies and platforms.

name: Machine Learning Applications
overview: This unit focuses on practical applications of machine learning algorithms.

name: Cybersecurity Strategies
overview: This unit covers cybersecurity strategies and risk management.

name: Big Data Analytics
overview: This unit focuses on analytics techniques for handling big data.

name: Digital Transformation Strategies
overview: This unit explores strategies for digital transformation in organizations.
